{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=Archer C3200 |revision=v1.x |series=AC3200 |upc= |ean= |asin=B00YY3XSSA;US;,B010Q11OGG;DE; |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=05/31/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Proware |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=TE7C3200 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4709A0 |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |ram1=256 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43602 |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM43602 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43602 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }}
:• 2x '''1300''' Mbps max PHY rate per each 80MHz wide 5GHz channel, :• 1x '''600''' Mbps max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''3200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC3200 Wireless Tri-Band Gigabit Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/cat-9_Archer-C3200.html}} "14112723200-1.0 Rev:1.0sp2" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. {{see also|Proware|TP-LINK}} ===News=== *[http://www.guru3d.com/news-story/tp-link-archer-c2600-and-c3200-wi-fi-routers.html On '''Guru3d'''] *[http://www.tomshardware.com/news/tp-link-wireless-router-mu-mimo-ac,28350.html On '''TomsHardWare'''] *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2015/32593-tp-link-debuts-ac-router-duo ''TP-LINK Debuts AC Router Duo - CES 2015'' on '''SmallNetBuilder''''] :*[[TP-LINK Archer C3200]] - ''AC3200 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router'' [https://fccid.io/TE7C3200 FCC] ::2x 1300Mbps (5GHz) / 600Mbps (2.4GHz), [[Broadcom]]'s XStream :*[[TP-LINK Archer C2600 v1.x|TP-LINK Archer C2600]] - ''AC2600 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router'' [https://fccid.io/TE7C2600 FCC] ::1733Mbps (5GHz) / 800Mbps (2.4GHz), 4x4 AC [[Qualcomm]] *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2016/32915-tp-link-ces-2016-announcements ''TP-LINK CES 2016 Announcements'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :*[[TP-LINK AD7200 (Talon)]] - ''AD7200 Multi-band Wi-Fi Router'' (802.11ac/ad) ::4600Mbps (60GHz) / 1733Mbps (5GHz) / 800Mbps (2.4GHz) (AC2600) ::AC2600 4x4 Qualcomm MU-MIMO with single-stream 802.11ad radio ::[[Qualcomm]] @1.4GHz dual core CPU, 2x USB 3.0 ports :*[[TP-LINK Archer C5400 v1.x]] - ''AC5300 Tri-Band Wi-Fi Gigabit Router'' [https://fccid.io/TE7C5400 FCC] ::2x 2167Mbps (5GHz) / 1000Mbps (2.4GHz), 4x4 [[Broadcom]] 1024-QAM ::[[Broadcom]] @1.4GHz dual core CPU, Wi-Fi co-processors in each radio :*[[TP-LINK Archer C3150]] - ''AC3100 Wireless Dual-Band Gigabit Router'' [https://fccid.io/TE7C3150 FCC] ::2167Mbps (5GHz) / 1000Mbps (2.4GHz), 4x4 [[Broadcom]] 1024-QAM ::[[Broadcom]] @1.4GHz dual core CPU, Wi-Fi co-processors in each radio :*[[TP-LINK SR20]] - ''AC1900 Smart Home Router with Touchscreen'' ::1300Mbps (5GHz) / 600Mbps (2.4GHz), ZigBee and Z-Wave ::@1GHz dual-core CPU, USB 2.0/3.0 ports, SD Card slot, 4.3" display ===See also=== *[[TP-LINK Archer C2600 v1.x]] *[[List of Tri-Band Wireless Devices]] *[[List of Four Stream Hardware]] ==Images== File:Archer_C3200.jpg|Archer C3200 [[Has images::external| ]]
